title: Version 0.21
content:
#### Added
- Added 2 new resource items: Refined wood and Firewood.
- Added 2 new jobs: Firemaking (to produce firewood) and Carpentry (to produce refined wood).
- Added a news popup that only shows if the user previously played on an older version.
- Added a News Button to view update logs.
- Added more icons to the Inventory.
- Added a Sidebar for Inventory.

#### Changes
- Improved Inventory UI.

### Fixes
- Fixed an issue where you could assign workers when requirements for a job were not being met.

### Removed
- Removed an old item (Recipe from thieving).
- Removed gold from Resources (This is always displayed in the top bar).
 #### [Play Version 0.21](https://shadxn.github.io/idle/test/idle_v0.20/)

title: Version 0.20
content:
#### First version
- This is the first version of the game.
- It includes basic resource gathering, crafting, and job systems.
- The game is designed to be simple and easy to play, with a focus on idle mechanics.
